pages.text: $(li)The Red Spotted Taiga is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga)Taiga$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation such as Dandelions, Violets, Taiga and Maple trees.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/fox)Foxes$(/l) like to walk around this place too.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Red Spotted Taiga$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
